settings.title: For everyday comfort
settings.subheading: The only pair of underwear you will ever want to wear again. Guaranteed!

settings.title: Not conviced?
settings.text: We are very convinced, that you will love our AJR-underwear. Are you convinced? If not, then get a test pair now for 79 kr. including delivery. It has never been cheaper!
settings.button_label: Get a pair for only 79 kr. now!

settings.title: Athletes use it already
settings.text: Top professional athletes around the world wear the AJR underwear to achieve their maximum performance getting an edge over their rivals.
settings.button_label: Get a pair for only 79 kr. now!

settings.testimonial: When I stand in front of world stars and have to perform at the highest level, it's good to wear some underwear that do not bother me while I’m playing.
settings.author: Nikolai Baden, Vitesse - latest a Juventus spiller

settings.testimonial: Arturo Erasmo Vidal Pardo (commonly known as Arturo Vidal) is a Chilean footballer who from 2020 will play as a midfielder for Italian Inter Milan. He has played for FC Barcelona from 2018 to 2020, where he joined from the German big club, FC Bayern Munich.
settings.author: Arturo Vidal, Inter Milan - Seria A

settings.testimonial: My name is Enock Poulsen I’m a professional boxer. I love wearing the AJR underwear because they are great to wear during training and combat. The comfort is super good, especially when I move around it feels good and flexible to wear compared to other underwear.
settings.author: Enock Poulsen, Professional boxer (European Champion 2022)

settings.title: No rolling up issues
settings.description: The unique combination of fabric and design makes the underwear stay in place with every movement.

settings.title: Comfortable on the skin
settings.description: Made of 94% cotton stretch and 6% spandex, giving you a soft and comfortable feel all day.

settings.title: Unique flexible fit
settings.description: Stretchy and flexible fit with a soft elastic waistband for comfort all day.

settings.title: Perfect fit for sports
settings.description: Designed for sports and everyday comfort. The design and combination of fabrics enables unlimited performance.
